title: Ciwei Xiao Zi Zhi Tiansheng Wo Ci
synopsis: Big Hedgehog (voiced by Su Shangqing) is a brave and happy little hedgehog. Although he often causes troubles of all sizes due to his impulsive personality, he is still deeply trusted and loved by friends. In an accident, the hedgehog lost his memory, so he and his friend A Hui (voiced by Tang Shuiyu) embarked on a journey to find himself. 　　 On the way, the two met the kind-hearted human Xiao Ming (voiced by Lu Zhixing). The kind-hearted Xiao Ming is committed to animal protection. He has repeatedly helped the hedgehog out of trouble, and the two have forged a deep friendship. A Mei (voiced by Yan Mengmeng) is the daughter of the leader of Hedgehog Valley. This unexpected journey also sparked a spark between her and the hedgehog. The evil and greedy Doctor Thinkman used Xiao Ming's love for animals to realize his ambitions. The hedgehog discovered the doctor's conspiracy. How can it defeat this powerful enemy? (translated from douban)
